channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Residents parking bay Russell Sq, 24th August
item.description:
Please could we have 1x pole and repeater Residents parking sign installed this location for this bay (1 already exists) to reinforce restrictions and aid enforcement Many thanks Kind regards

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded/missing road markings, 24th August
item.description:
Apologies - no option to report road markings - please can you add this option? Yellow blip(s) on kerb linked to double yellow lines have worn out. Also ends missing to double yellow lines. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11-12, Hanover Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Always a mess!!, 24th August
item.description:
The little road is behind the shops but it is not retail waste/rubbish. Always disgusting around the back here and needs to be cleaned up and kept clean. It stinks, there are flies, the crows have a feast with the discarded food scraps. Just nasty!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 470, Bromley Road, Southend, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken pavement, 24th August
item.description:
Hi, I am reporting on behalf of my mother in law. The pavement outside her house has broken up and it's beyond her boundary. Can you please advise who is responsible for this. The neighbour had theirs repaired recently.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brunswick Road, Blendon, London

item.title: Bollard been hit and uprooted, 24th August
item.description:
The bollard on the corner of this junction has been hit and damaged. Torn from the pavement and obstructing the cycle lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckenham Road, Penge, London

item.title: Dead fox in garden, 24th August
item.description:
Needs collecting as it's attracting flies and worried about catching deseases for myself and other animals. Address: 7 Pytchley Crescent Upper Norwood London SE19 3AT Asked for help when fox was discovered,got no help at all and very angry and sad that the fox has since died this morning from Saturday night... Needs collecting as soon as possible..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pytchley Crescent, Upper Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 24th August
item.description:
A number of items (with a similar description to other flytipped goods further down the road) dumped on the pavement, by the entrance to the car park of the Kentwood Centre. Believed to have been left last night. Potentially dangerous liquids amongst the items. An unsightly, worrying trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken litter bin in Broxbourne Gardens, Orpington, BR6, 24th August
item.description:
As well as the still overflowing dog waste bin at the bottom of Broxbourne Gardens, Orpington, BR6, which has already been reported, the litter bin at the top of the Gardens has been knocked off its post and is lying some distance away - see attached photo.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sequoia Gardens, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street is filthy with dog fouling, litter, dead rodents & over grown weeds, 24th August
item.description:
The street is filthy dirty & needs a deep clean (I have never seen any street cleaners in this street). Dog poo everywhere, dead mice in footpath, litter everywhere and over grown weeds, it’s disgusting. When are Hackney council going to clean the street?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Carysfort Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
